import React from 'react' import './App.scss' import AsideBar from '../AsideBar/AsideBar' import MainContent from '../MainContent/MainContent' import TaskModal from '../TaskModal/TaskModal' import { withApp } from '../../hoc/withApp' const App = ({ darkMode }) => { return (
) } export default withApp(App)
